title: U.S. Amazon retail market share 2016 and 2020
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Market share. In total the number of data points it has is 2.
In general Market share has rose over the Year.
Market share is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2020.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2020.
Maximum Market share, about 50.0 was reported at Year 2020
Minimum Market share about 34.0 was reached at Year 2016
